   20: 
   21: %%
   22: -module(mnesia2_install_test).
   23: -author('hakan@erix.ericsson.se').
   24: 
   25: -compile([export_all]).
   26: -include("mnesia2_test_lib.hrl").
   27: 
   28: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   29:     mnesia2_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   30: 
   31: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   32:     mnesia2_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   33: 
   34: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   35: all() -> 
   36:     [silly_durability, silly_move, silly_upgrade].
   37: 
   38: groups() -> 
   39:     [{stress, [], stress_cases()}].
   40: 
   41: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   42:     Config.
   43: 
   44: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   45:     Config.
   46: 
   47: 
   48: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   49: %% Stepwise of more and more advanced features
   50: silly() ->
   51:     Nodes = [node()] ++ nodes(),
   52:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2(Nodes),
   53:     Config = [{nodes, Nodes}],
   54:     mnesia2_test_lib:eval_test_case(?MODULE, silly2, Config).
   55: 
   56: silly2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   57:     [Node1 | _] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
   58:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2(Nodes),
   59:     ?ignore([mnesia2:delete_schema([N]) || N <- Nodes]),
   60:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:create_schema([Node1])),
   61:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, start, [])),
   62:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, wait_for_tables,
   63: 			[[schema], infinity])),
   64:     Res = silly_durability(Config),
   65:     StressFun = fun(F) -> apply(?MODULE, F, [Config]) end,
   66:     R =
   67: 	case length(Nodes) of
   68: 	    L when L > 1 ->
   69: 		Node2 = lists:nth(2, Nodes),
   70: 		AddDb = [schema, Node2, ram_copies],
   71: 		?match({atomic, ok},
   72: 		       rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, add_table_copy, AddDb)),
   73: 		Args = [[{extra_db_nodes, [Node1]}]],
   74: 		?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia2, start, Args)),
   75: 		ChangeDb = [schema, Node2, disc_copies],
   76: 		?match({atomic, ok},
   77: 		       rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, change_table_copy_type,
   78: 				ChangeDb)),
   79: 		?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:sync_tables([Node1, Node2],
   80: 						       [schema])),
   81: 		MoveRes = silly_move(Config),
   82: 		UpgradeRes = silly_upgrade(Config),
   83: 		StressRes = [StressFun(F) || F <- stress_cases()],
   84: 		?verify_mnesia2([Node2], []),
   85: 		[Res, MoveRes, UpgradeRes] ++ StressRes;
   86: 	    _ ->
   87: 		StressRes = [StressFun(F) || F <- stress_cases()],
   88: 		?warning("Too few nodes. Perform net_adm:ping(OtherNode) "
   89: 			 "and rerun!!!~n", []),
   90: 		[Res | StressRes]
   91: 	end,
   92:     ?verify_mnesia2([Node1], []),
   93:     R.
   94: 
   95: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   96: silly_durability(doc) ->
   97:     ["Simple test of durability"];
   98: silly_durability(suite) -> [];
   99: silly_durability(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  100:     [Node1] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  101:     Tab = silly,
  102:     Storage = mnesia2_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),   
  103:     
  104:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, 
  105: 				  create_table, [Tab, [{Storage, [Node1]}]])),
  106: 
  107:     Read = fun() -> mnesia2:read({Tab, a}) end,
  108:     Write = fun() -> mnesia2:write({Tab, a, b}) end,
  109: 
  110:     ?match({atomic, []},
  111: 	   rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, transaction, [Read])),
  112:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  113: 	   rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, transaction, [Write])),
  114:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, a, b}]}, 
  115: 	   rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, transaction, [Read])),
  116:     
  117:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, stop, [])),
  118:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, start, [])),
  119:     case mnesia2_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
  120: 	true -> 
  121: 	    skip;
  122: 	false ->
  123: 	    ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], infinity])),	    
  124: 	    ?match({atomic, [{Tab, a, b}]},
  125: 		   rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, transaction, [Read]))
  126:     end,
  127:     ?verify_mnesia2([Node1], []).
  128: 
  129: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  130: silly_move(doc) ->
  131:     ["Simple test of movement of a replica from one node to another"];
  132: silly_move(suite) -> [];
  133: silly_move(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  134:     [Node1, Node2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  135:     Tab = silly_move,
  136:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  137: 	   rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2,
  138: 		    create_table, [Tab, [{ram_copies, [Node2]}]])),
  139:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:sync_tables([Node1, Node2], [Tab])),
  140: 
  141:     Read = fun() -> mnesia2:read({Tab, a}) end,
  142:     Write = fun() -> mnesia2:write({Tab, a, b}) end,
  143: 
  144:     ?match({atomic, []},
  145: 	   rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, transaction, [Read])),
  146:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  147: 	   rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, transaction, [Write])),
  148:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, a, b}]}, 
  149: 	   rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, transaction, [Read])),
  150:     
  151:     case mnesia2_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
  152: 	true -> skip;
  153: 	false -> 
  154: 	    ?match({atomic, ok}, 
  155: 		   rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2,
  156: 			    change_table_copy_type, [Tab, Node2, disc_only_copies])),
  157: 	    ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:sync_tables([Node1, Node2], [Tab]))
  158:     end,
  159:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, a, b}]}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, transaction, [Read])),
  160: 
  161:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  162: 	   rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2,
  163: 		    move_table_copy, [Tab, Node2, Node1])),
  164:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:sync_tables([Node1, Node2], [Tab])),
  165:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, a, b}]},
  166: 	   rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, transaction, [Read])),
  167:     ?verify_mnesia2([Node1], []).
  168: 
  169: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  170: silly_upgrade(doc) ->
  171:     ["Simple test of a schema upgrade and restore from backup"];
  172: silly_upgrade(suite) -> [];
  173: silly_upgrade(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  174:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  175:     Name = silly_upgrade,
  176:     Tab1 = silly_upgrade1,
  177:     Tab2 = silly_upgrade2,
  178:     Bup = "silly_upgrade.BUP",
  179:     Bup2 = "silly_upgrade_part.BUP",
  180:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:create_table(Tab1, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
  181:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:create_table(Tab2, [{disc_only_copies, Nodes}])),
  182: 
  183:     CpState = add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, []),
  184:     ?match(match, verify_state(Tab1, Tab2, CpState)),
  185:     file:delete(Bup),
  186:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:backup(Bup)),
  187:     Args = [{name, Name}, {ram_overrides_dump, true},
  188: 	    {min, [Tab1, schema]}, {max, [Tab2]}],
  189:     ?match({ok, Name, _}, mnesia2:activate_checkpoint(Args)),
  190: 
  191:     IgnoreState = add_more_records(Tab1, Tab2, CpState),
  192:     ?match(match, verify_state(Tab1, Tab2, IgnoreState)),
  193:     ?match({mismatch, _, _}, verify_state(Tab1, Tab2, CpState)),
  194:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:del_table_copy(Tab2, Node1)),
  195:     file:delete(Bup2),
  196:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:backup_checkpoint(Name, Bup2)),
  197: 
  198:     UpgradeState = transform_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, IgnoreState),
  199:     ?match({mismatch, _, _}, verify_state(Tab1, Tab2, CpState)),
  200:     ?match({mismatch, _, _}, verify_state(Tab1, Tab2, IgnoreState)),
  201:     ?match(match, verify_state(Tab1, Tab2, UpgradeState)),
  202: 
  203:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:deactivate_checkpoint(Name)),
  204:     ?match(match, verify_state(Tab1, Tab2, UpgradeState)),
  205: 
  206:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:install_fallback(Bup2)),
  207:     file:delete(Bup2),
  208:     %% Will generate intentional crash, fatal error
  209:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:stop_mnesia2([Node2])),
  210:     wait_till_dead([Node1, Node2]),
  211:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:start_mnesia2([Node1, Node2], [Tab1, Tab2])),
  212:     ?match(match, verify_state(Tab1, Tab2, CpState)),
  213: 
  214:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:install_fallback(Bup)),
  215:     file:delete(Bup),
  216:     %% Will generate intentional crash, fatal error
  217:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:stop_mnesia2([Node1, Node2])),
  218:     wait_till_dead([Node1, Node2]),
  219:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:start_mnesia2([Node1, Node2], [Tab1, Tab2])),
  220:     CpState2 = [X || X <- CpState, element(1, X) /= Tab1],
  221:     ?match(match, verify_state(Tab1, Tab2, CpState2)),
  222:     ?verify_mnesia2(Nodes, []).
  223: 
  224: wait_till_dead([]) ->
  225:     ok; %% timer:sleep(5);
  226: wait_till_dead(Repeat = [N|Ns]) ->
  227:     Apps = rpc:call(N, application, which_applications, []),
  228:     case lists:keymember(mnesia2, 1, Apps) of
  229: 	true ->
  230: 	    timer:sleep(10),
  231: 	    wait_till_dead(Repeat);
  232: 	false ->
  233: 	    case rpc:call(N, erlang, whereis, [mnesia2_monitor]) of
  234: 		undefined ->
  235: 		    wait_till_dead(Ns);
  236: 		_ ->
  237: 		    timer:sleep(10),
  238: 		    wait_till_dead(Repeat)
  239: 	    end
  240:     end.
  241: 
  242: add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, Old) ->
  243:     Recs1 = [{Tab1, I, I} || I <- lists:seq(1, 30)],
  244:     Recs2 = [{Tab2, I, I} || I <- lists:seq(20, 40)],
  245:     lists:foreach(fun(R) -> mnesia2:dirty_write(R) end, Recs1),
  246:     Fun = fun(R) -> mnesia2:write(R) end,
  247:     Trans = fun() -> lists:foreach(Fun, Recs2) end,
  248:     ?match({atomic, _}, mnesia2:transaction(Trans)),
  249:     lists:sort(Old ++ Recs1 ++ Recs2).
  250: 
  251: add_more_records(Tab1, Tab2, Old) ->
  252:     Change1 = [{T, K, V+100} || {T, K, V} <- Old, K==23],
  253:     Change2 = [{T, K, V+100} || {T, K, V} <- Old, K==24],
  254:     Del = [{T, K} || {T, K, _V} <- Old, K>=25],
  255:     New = [{Tab1, 50, 50}, {Tab2, 50, 50}],
  256:     lists:foreach(fun(R) -> mnesia2:dirty_write(R) end, Change1),
  257:     lists:foreach(fun(R) -> mnesia2:dirty_delete(R) end, Del),
  258:     Fun = fun(R) -> mnesia2:write(R) end,
  259:     Trans = fun() -> lists:foreach(Fun, Change2 ++ New) end,
  260:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:transaction(Trans)),
  261:     Recs = [{T, K, V} || {T, K, V} <- Old, K<23] ++ Change1 ++ Change2 ++ New,
  262:     lists:sort(Recs).
  263: 
  264: 
  265: verify_state(Tab1, Tab2, Exp) ->
  266:     Fun = fun() ->
  267: 		  Act1 = [mnesia2:read({Tab1, K}) || K <- mnesia2:all_keys(Tab1)],
  268: 		  Act2 = [mnesia2:read({Tab2, K}) || K <- mnesia2:all_keys(Tab2)],
  269: 		  Act = lists:append(Act1) ++ lists:append(Act2),
  270: 		  {ok, Act -- Exp, Exp -- Act}
  271: 	  end,
  272:     case mnesia2:transaction(Fun) of
  273: 	{atomic, {ok, [], []}} -> match;
  274: 	{atomic, {ok, More, Less}} -> {mismatch, More, Less};
  275: 	{aborted, Reason} -> {error, Reason}
  276:     end.
  277: 
  278: transform_some_records(Tab1, _Tab2, Old) ->
  279:      Fun = fun(Rec) ->
  280: 		   list_to_tuple(tuple_to_list(Rec) ++ [4711])
  281: 	   end,
  282:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  283: 	   mnesia2:transform_table(Tab1, Fun, [key, val, extra])),
  284:     Filter = fun(Rec) when element(1, Rec) == Tab1 -> {true, Fun(Rec)};
  285: 		(_) -> true
  286: 	     end,
  287:     lists:sort(lists:zf(Filter, Old)).
  288: 
  289: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  290: 
  291: stress_cases() -> 
  292: [conflict, dist].
  293: 
  294: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  295: dist(doc) ->
  296:     ["Avoid lock conflicts in order to maximize thruput",
  297:      "Ten drivers per node, tables replicated to all nodes, lots of branches"];
  298: dist(suite) -> [];
  299: dist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  300:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, 10 * 60000}]),
  301:     Storage = mnesia2_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
  302:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia2_tpcb:start(dist_args(Nodes, Storage))).
  303: 
  304: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  305: conflict(doc) ->
  306:     ["Provoke a lot of lock conflicts.",
  307:      "Ten drivers per node, tables replicated to all nodes, single branch"];
  308: conflict(suite) -> [];
  309: conflict(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  310:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, 10 * 60000}]),
  311:     Storage = mnesia2_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
  312:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia2_tpcb:start(conflict_args(Nodes, Storage))).
  313: 
  314: conflict_args(Nodes, ReplicaType) ->
  315:     [{db_nodes, Nodes},
  316:      {driver_nodes, Nodes},
  317:      {replica_nodes, Nodes},
  318:      {n_drivers_per_node, 10},
  319:      {n_branches, 1},
  320:      {n_accounts_per_branch, 10},
  321:      {replica_type, ReplicaType},
  322:      {stop_after, timer:minutes(5)},
  323:      {report_interval, timer:seconds(10)},
  324:      {use_running_mnesia2, true},
  325:      {reuse_history_id, true}].
  326: 
  327: dist_args(Nodes, ReplicaType) ->
  328:     [{db_nodes, Nodes},
  329:      {driver_nodes, Nodes},
  330:      {replica_nodes, Nodes},
  331:      {n_drivers_per_node, 10},
  332:      {n_branches, length(Nodes) * 100},
  333:      {n_accounts_per_branch, 10},
  334:      {replica_type, ReplicaType},
  335:      {stop_after, timer:minutes(5)},
  336:      {report_interval, timer:seconds(10)},
  337:      {use_running_mnesia2, true},
  338:      {reuse_history_id, true}].
  339:
